row_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) >= 3)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 12)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 16)
col_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) >= 4)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) = 1)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) = 3)
row_desc: Queen has at least three mini challenge wins.
col_desc: Queen has at least four lip sync wins.
Queen has one lip sync win.
Queen has three lip sync wins.
